1066000070565335040.text: Idiots like this are why we need to stick to the term “climate change” and not “global warming”https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1065400254151954432 …

1066003011850379269.text: It's always been climate change global warming is more the effect of it. Average global teemperature will rise by 2 degrees which is catastrophic

1066003217572655104.text: He obviously doesn't care about the difference cus he's a blithering idiot.

1066008869107892225.text: Yes but people use the terms interchangeably. They aren’t. Climate change is about temperatures and weather becoming extreme. What he fails to realize is that the record cold temps are evidence of climate change
